definitions.definition: Any acidophilic bacteria of the genus Acidobacterium , the family Acidobacteriaceae , or the phylum Acidobacteria , which engage in non-oxygenic photosynthesis .

main_definition: Any acidophilic bacteria of the genus Acidobacterium , the family Acidobacteriaceae , or the phylum Acidobacteria , which engage in non-oxygenic photosynthesis .
